statements.insert:
select SEQ_PM_RawData_MoveTrain_Id.nextval as IntId from dual
insert into PM_RawData_MoveTrain ( I_IntId ,I_SiteNo ,C_OrderNo ,C_CarNo ,C_FormationTag ,I_WeightData ,I_Speed ,D_WeightTime ,I_WeightFlag ,I_DataFlag ,I_IsUse ,C_CreateUser ,D_CreateTime ,C_UpdateUser ,D_UpdateTime )values (#IntId#,#SiteNo.PoundSiteNo#,#OrderNo#,#CarNo#,#FormationTag#,#WeightData#,#Speed#,#WeightTime#,#WeightFlag.IntValue#,#DataFlag.IntValue#,#IsUse#,#CreateUser#,to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'),#UpdateUser#,to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss'))
statements.update: update PM_RawData_MoveTrain set I_IntId=#IntId# ,I_SiteNo=#SiteNo.PoundSiteNo# ,C_OrderNo=#OrderNo# ,C_CarNo=#CarNo# ,C_FormationTag=#FormationTag# ,I_WeightData=#WeightData# ,I_Speed=#Speed# ,D_WeightTime=#WeightTime# ,I_WeightFlag=#WeightFlag.IntValue# ,I_DataFlag=#DataFlag.IntValue# ,I_IsUse=#IsUse# ,C_UpdateUser=#UpdateUser# ,D_UpdateTime=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') where I_IntId = #IntId#
update PM_RawData_MoveTrain set I_IsUse=#IsUse# where C_FormationTag=#FormationTag# and I_SiteNo=#SiteNo.PoundSiteNo#
statements.select:
select distinct C_FormationTag as FormationTag, count(a.C_FormationTag) as FormationTagnum, a.I_IsUse as IsUse from PM_RawData_MoveTrain a where I_DataFlag!=4
and I_SiteNo='$SiteNo$'
and C_FormationTag like '%$Date$%'
group by C_FormationTag,I_IsUse order by C_FormationTag DESC

select a.I_IntId ,a.I_SiteNo ,b.C_PoundSiteName ,a.C_OrderNo ,a.C_CarNo ,a.C_FormationTag ,a.I_WeightData ,a.I_Speed ,a.D_WeightTime ,a.I_WeightFlag ,a.I_DataFlag ,a.I_IsUse ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_RawData_MoveTrain a left join SM_PoundSite_Info b on a.I_SiteNo = b.C_PoundSiteNo order by a.I_IntId desc

select a.I_IntId ,a.I_SiteNo ,b.C_PoundSiteName ,a.C_OrderNo ,a.C_CarNo ,a.C_FormationTag ,a.I_WeightData ,a.I_Speed ,a.D_WeightTime ,a.I_WeightFlag ,a.I_DataFlag ,a.I_IsUse ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_RawData_MoveTrain a left join SM_PoundSite_Info b on a.I_SiteNo = b.C_PoundSiteNo where a.C_CarNo = #value# and a.I_WeightFlag=2 and a.I_DataFlag=3 order by a.I_IntId desc

select a.I_IntId ,a.I_SiteNo ,b.C_PoundSiteName ,a.C_OrderNo ,a.C_CarNo ,a.C_FormationTag ,a.I_WeightData ,a.I_Speed ,a.D_WeightTime ,a.I_WeightFlag ,a.I_DataFlag ,a.I_IsUse ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_RawData_MoveTrain a left join SM_PoundSite_Info b on a.I_SiteNo = b.C_PoundSiteNo
a.C_CarNo = '$CarNo$'
a.I_SiteNo = '$SiteNo$'
a.C_FormationTag = '$FormationTag$'
a.D_WeightTime >= '$BeginDate$'
'$EndDate$'>=a.D_WeightTime
order by a.I_IntId desc

SELECT a.I_IntId ,a.I_SiteNo ,b.C_PoundSiteName ,a.C_OrderNo ,a.C_CarNo ,a.C_FormationTag ,a.I_WeightData ,a.I_Speed ,a.D_WeightTime ,a.I_WeightFlag ,a.I_DataFlag ,a.I_IsUse ,a.C_CreateUser ,a.D_CreateTime ,a.C_UpdateUser ,a.D_UpdateTime from PM_RawData_MoveTrain a left join SM_PoundSite_Info b on a.I_SiteNo = b.C_PoundSiteNo
a.I_SiteNo = '$SiteNo$'
a.C_FormationTag = '$FormationTag$'
and a.I_DataFlag!=4 order by a.C_OrderNo
statements.update: update PM_RawData_MoveTrain set I_DataFlag=4, C_UPDATEUSER=#UpdateUser#, D_UPDATETIME=to_char(sysdate,'yyyyMMddhh24miss') where I_INTID=#IntId#
